title: Landfall Asia
creator_credit: Gordon Sparling, William Canning, Tim Wilson and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A spring cruise to the Far East with three destroyers of the Royal Canadian Navy. The film follows the ships to the exotic ports of Japan, Hong Kong, Ceylon, Bangkok. Highlighted is the Commonwealth exercise, “Jetex,” a simulated naval engagement.
creator_credit_for_label: Gordon Sparling, William Canning, Tim Wilson and National Film Board of Canada
